title: Online Currency Trading using Digital wallet and cryptocurrency
description: The main goals of the project are to build reliable e-wallet that can load money from both traditional bank accounts and cryptocurrency accounts, an easy-to-use website for safe digital currency trading

title: E-commerce website
description: Developed a fully responsive e-commerce landing page using React and CSS, ensuring seamless user experience across all devices. The site features an intuitive interface,efficient navigation, and modern design, optimized for performance and user engagement.

title: Food delivery app
description: Developed a full-stack food delivery application with features like user authentication, real-time order tracking, and dynamic menu management, utilizing the MERN stack for seamless performance and scalability.
